T

testMerge() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.IsleCircleTest
set black tower on both isle 2 and 3 merging them, the size of the isle circle should be 11 mother nature goes back to isle index of the first merged isle (2) set black tower on isle 3, merging it with the previous merge, makes get size of isle circle go to 10 the same happens with tower of different colour
towerPlacingTest() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.GameBoardTest
placeTowerOnIsle places tower.black on isle 5, so getIsleTowerColour returns 5 placeTowerOnIsle places tower.black on isle 6, so now 5 and 6 can merge after merging, get size of isle circle returns 11
